name: NecSurvimancery
description:
NecSurvimancery 

is a game where your skeletons doing your job... killing local people!
There are 3 types of skeletons to improve your army. 

Your goals are harvest souls as much as you can and survive.

Also we’re highly recommend to you PUSH your skeletons and enemies for fun :)

Controls

WASD to move.

Credits

Developer:  Utkucan Ay
Art:  Arda Algül
Music: Ezgi Katı
